======================
pipeline_utils
======================

Overview
--------

This package serves to collate a number of other functions from other packages such that they can be called in the frontend. image_processing also contains logic to run FastSurfer in a compatible apptainer.

Modules:
---------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   pipeline_utils.frontend
   pipeline_utils.get_scores
   pipeline_utils.image_processing
